sentences.en: ‘Do you need any help?’ ‘No. It’s under control , thanks.’
sentences.cn: “你需要帮忙吗？”“不用，已经搞定了。谢谢。”

sentences.en: a huge company controlling half the world’s coffee trade
sentences.cn: 控制全球一半咖啡贸易的一家大公司

sentences.en: A number of the French players went nuts, completely out of control.
sentences.cn: 有几个法国运动员简直是疯了，完全失去了控制。

sentences.en: a skilled rider controlling a spirited horse
sentences.cn: 驾驭烈马的一名技巧娴熟的骑手

sentences.en: Always buy a heater with thermostat control to save on running costs.
sentences.cn: 始终购买可调温度的取暖器以节省使用成本。

sentences.en: Condoms are an effective method of birth control if used with care.
sentences.cn: 如果使用得当，避孕套是很有效的避孕手段。

sentences.en: Dogs are allowed on the trails if they are kept under control .
sentences.cn: 狗在受到看管的情况下可以在小径上走。

sentences.en: Flight delays do occur, for reasons that are outside our control .
sentences.cn: 飞机延误的确会发生，其原因不是我们可以控制的。

sentences.en: He balanced his budgets by rigid control over public expenditure.
sentences.cn: 他通过严格控制公共开支保持预算平衡。

sentences.en: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.cn: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.en: He is still bickering with the control tower over admissible approach routes.
sentences.cn: 他还在为可采用的进近航线与指挥塔台争执不下。

sentences.en: He was making a visible effort to control himself.
sentences.cn: 他明显是在努力控制自己的情绪。

sentences.en: it took two hours to bring the blaze under control.
sentences.cn: 控制火势花了两个小时。

sentences.en: pest control
sentences.cn: 虫害防治

sentences.en: Police had to be called in to control the crowds.
sentences.cn: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.en: The car spun out of control and hit a tree.
sentences.cn: 汽车失控打转，撞到了树上。

sentences.en: The company invested thousands in an electronic order-control system.
sentences.cn: 公司耗资数千购买了一套电子订单管理系统。

sentences.en: The Democrats continued to control the Senate until last year.
sentences.cn: 民主党继续控制参议院直到去年。

sentences.en: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

sentences.en: The passengers went through immigration control and collected their baggage.
sentences.cn: 旅客通过入境检查后领取了自己的行李。

sentences.en: The pill is the most efficient method of birth control.
sentences.cn: 服用避孕药是最有效的避孕方法。

sentences.en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
sentences.cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

sentences.en: Their talks are expected to focus on arms control.
sentences.cn: 他们的会谈预计会集中讨论军备控制问题。

sentences.en: They have to wait for clearance from air traffic control.
sentences.cn: 他们需要等空中交通管制人员的放行。

sentences.en: This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
sentences.cn: 这场由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经引发了无数流血的战争。

sentences.en: Troops are still in control of the television and radio tower.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然控制着电视和广播发射塔。

sentences.en: Use this technique to control your level of arousal.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法来控制性兴奋程度。

words.tran_cn: 可控制的；可管理的；能操纵的
受控制的；受约束的；克制的
主计员或管理员之职位或任期
控制；约束（control的过去式）；指挥

phrases.tran_cn: 控制组（自变量的一种处理方法）；实验对照组
（对形势、人或活动）能指挥的，能控制的
（危险，紧急情况）处于控制之下

trans.tran_cn: 统治，控制（力），克制，管理，限制，控制按钮，检查站/人员，对照标准
trans.tran_en: the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

trans.tran_cn: 指挥，控制，限定，限制，阻止蔓延，抑制
trans.tran_en: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want
